title: Adjust hero headline to fit within the glass panel

requirements.text: Update only the selected Hero headline element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]) so the H1 text is visually contained within its glass panel on all screen sizes (no overflow/cropping), by making the typography responsive and allowing safe wrapping within the box while keeping the existing headline text unchanged.

quotes: Move it into the box and fit it in the box

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile widths (~320px), the hero headline “PRECISION. AUTOMATED.” stays fully inside the glass panel without horizontal overflow, clipping, or causing horizontal page scrolling.
On tablet/desktop widths, the headline remains visually prominent (large display type) and centered as before, with no regression in spacing relative to the subheadline.
Only the <h1> element styling/attributes are changed; surrounding container/panel structure and all other elements remain unchanged.
The headline text content remains exactly: “PRECISION. AUTOMATED.”

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element (the Hero section <h1> at the provided XPath).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths.
Do not change the headline text copy; adjust only styling/fit behavior.
nonGoals: No layout redesign of the Hero section or glass panel container.
No changes to routing, authentication, or backend canister APIs.
